Referência em equipamentos para controle: Reference in equipment for production control for the food industry.
Ajudamos nossos clientes a alcançar resu: We help our clients achieve results with maximum efficiency, commitment and professionalism, offering fast solutions and the best cost-benefit ratio in the market.
Desenvolver e fornecer soluções para a i: Develop and provide solutions for the food industry, through the use of high technology in weighing, grading and control of production indicators.
Ser referência no Brasil e no mundo no d: To be a reference in worldwide in the development and supply of machines, parts and equipment for production control for the food industry.
Reunimos mais de 20 anos de experiência: We have more than 20 years of experience in many areas of engineering: mechanics, electrical, automation and software, enabling us to develop proprietary technology to board our equipment, and offer maximum efficiency to our customers.
Responsabilidade e ética com todos os no: Responsibility and ethics with all our stakeholders;
Serviço bem feito é resultado de gente c: A well done service is the result of competent and happy people;
Zelamos pelo ambiente e equipamentos de: We care for the environment and equipment of our customers;
Atitude de servir está no nosso DNA;: Attitude to serve is in our DNA;
Após uma longa jornada de mais de 15 ano: After a long journey of more than 15 years of professional experience in major industries, of world referenced agroindustrial equipments, in 2013 Vanderlei Gerhart decides to create Gertech Soluções Industriais to offer technical assistance services for machines in the weighing and grading lines throughout Brazil.
Com reconhecida qualidade na entrega dos: With recognized quality in the delivery of products and services, Gertech becomes an important ally to agro-industries and one of the main industrial maintenance companies in the segment, earning the trust of the main agroindustrial units in Brazil.
Hoje a Gertech Soluções Industriais agre: Today Gertech Soluções Industriais adds to industrial maintenance a wide range of products and services, such as: Nationalization of parts and components, Industrial Electronics, Automation Solutions, Machine Retrofit, and Upgrade for obsolete equipment.
Em 2019 atendendo a crescente demanda da: In 2019, following the growing demand of the industry for efficient and remote management in real time, a new phase begins, Gertech Soluções Industriais begins to design and manufacture its own machines for weighing and grading, with its brand: WEIMACH® an abbreviation of "Weight Machine", and in this way it expands its performance and starts to offer complete and convergent solutions for Industry 4.0.
Hoje a Gertech Soluções Industriais ofer: Today Gertech Soluções Industriais offers a wide range of Checkweigher (Checkweighers or Weights Controllers), Grading Machine (Classifiers), Poultry Controllers (Poultry Counters), Weighing terminals and box labeling, among other products. Most importantly, all connected to the management and control systems of the agroindustry, making easy the collection and reading of data and optimizing decision-making.
